prompt: Photorealistic close-up shot of a hand carefully holding a crystal antique drinking glass up to a bright window, examining it for imperfections and identifying marks. Focus on the clarity of the glass, the subtle refractions of light, and the detailed textures of the hand. Shallow depth of field, with the background blurred to emphasize the glass. Natural, diffused lighting. --ar 16:9
name: antique-drinking-glasses-identification-image-1.png

prompt: Overhead shot of a well-lit antique dealer's table covered with a variety of antique drinking glasses of different styles and eras. Each glass is carefully arranged to showcase its unique features. Include magnifying glasses, antique reference books, and notepads scattered around the table to suggest the process of identification and research. High resolution, sharp focus, warm and inviting lighting. --ar 16:9
name: antique-drinking-glasses-identification-image-2.png

prompt: A detail shot of the base of an antique drinking glass, showcasing a maker's mark or signature etched into the glass. The glass is resting on a dark, textured surface, and the lighting is focused on the mark to highlight its details. Use macro photography techniques to capture the intricate details of the mark. Dramatic, focused lighting with strong shadows. --ar 16:9
name: antique-drinking-glasses-identification-image-3.png

prompt: A side-by-side comparison of two antique drinking glasses, one made of pressed glass and the other of blown glass. The glasses are placed against a neutral background, and the lighting is even to highlight the differences in their textures and construction. Include a small diagram or label pointing out the key features that distinguish the two types of glass. Educational, informative, and well-lit. --ar 16:9
name: antique-drinking-glasses-identification-image-4.png

prompt: A wide shot of a brightly lit professional photography studio setup used for photographing antique drinking glasses. Show the softboxes, reflectors, and camera equipment in the background, with a single antique drinking glass prominently displayed on a turntable in the foreground. The glass is illuminated to showcase its color and details. The image should convey the professional process of documenting and identifying antique glassware. Clean, modern, and technically precise. --ar 16:9
name: antique-drinking-glasses-identification-image-5.png
